properties.address: The Goldhay Centre, Peterborough, Cambs PE2 5QP
properties.description: Weekly Community Cafe open to members of the public. Every Wednesday 9.30am to 11.30am. Entrance is £1 for Adults, 50p for school aged children, and free for under 5s. For entrance fee, people can have as many drinks, toast, cereal and pastries as they wish. There may also be a chance to take vegetables or bread home as well, if we have them. There are often guests at the cafe who can discuss things and offer support, in areas of health, housing, and finance. We are a charity and community centre supporting families and Parent Carers with children ages 0-25 with SEND
properties.title: Family Voice Community cafe
